subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brad Maynard of the Chicago Bears holds a dubious Super Bowl record. He punted 11 times as a member of the Giants, who lost, 34-7, to the Baltimore Ravens in Super Bowl XXXV on Jan. 28, 2001.
